title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and quickly toss with pancetta.
Remove from heat, mix in egg-cheese mixture, season with pepper, and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt & tikka paste for 1 hour.
Fry onion, add tomato puree, cook for 10 min.
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer gently.
Garnish with coriander and serve with rice or naan.
